text: This is getting out of hand. GPT-10 generating entire startups now? What's next? GPT-20 generating entire planets? 🤔
I can't wait for GPT-30, it'll solve world hunger by generating perfectly optimized food distribution systems.
GPT-40 will probably just generate an entirely new universe for us to live in.
What if GPT-10 generates a startup that's just... another GPT-10?
Yo dawg, I heard you like GPT, so we put a GPT in your GPT so you can generate while you generate.
Recursive GPTs? We're just a few iterations away from Skynet at this point.
I'm just waiting for the day when GPT can generate me a fulfilling social life.
That's a tall order, even for GPT-10. Perhaps you should try GPT-5? I heard it's quite good at generating friendships.
What if we're all just GPT-generated comments in a GPT-generated world, and this is our existence now?
Well, that's my existential crisis for the day. Thanks a lot, kernelKommando.
I'm curious about the legal implications of a GPT-generated startup. Who owns the IP? The AI, the developers, or the AI-generated CEO?
There's an interesting case to be made for the AI-generated CEO. If they can pass the Turing Test, maybe they deserve a shot at owning the IP.
